title.en: Kuma to Usagi wa Tomodachi dewa Irarenai

altTitles.ja: クマとウサギは友達ではいられない

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuma to Usagi wa Tomodachi de wa Irarenai

altTitles.en: Bear and Bunny Cannot Be Friends

altTitles.ja: チャラ男くんと清楚ちゃん

description.en:
A playboy goes after an innocent-seeming girl, having no idea what he's getting into.

**Note:** Not to be confused with [NoTR](https://mangadex.org/title/03346265-8076-4b14-8c80-78c2f04511be), another series from this same artist.

After graduating from the police academy and being commissioned as an Inspector, Jiyong investigates the suspicious complainant Hwang Seong-gu and encounters a nationwide rental scam case. As Jiyong pursues the rental scam gang that evades proper legal judgment, he feels his vigilante rules being tested. And in the meantime, the four vigilantes involved receive threats from someone aware of their identities. They begin to sense the shadow of a great evil behind their adversaries.
Dani and Dorian have missed the bus of the school of magic. Now, they must find someone who teach them how to be a great and good witches… Or maybe not.​
description.es: Dani y Dorian han perdido el bus a la Escuela de Magia. Ahora, ellos deben encontrar a alguien que les enseñe como ser geniales y buenos hechiceros… o tal vez no.
description.ru: Однажды двое юных волшебников опоздали на Хогвартс-экс… на свой автобус в школу волшебства. Домой вернуться — прибьют, учиться самим — «гори-гори ясно, злостное колдунство» в исполнении местных совершенно немагических жителей. Не учиться совсем — быть Дэни оружием массового поражения, а ее брату Дориану остаться без прав на вождение метлой. Придется искать учителя, чтобы помог набраться ума-разума… или нет. Такого эпично сказочного прогула вы еще не видели!

description.en:
In a world where, due to a supernatural event called THE SHINING, all male genetics of both people and animals have disappeared, leaving no trace, leaving only women alive to rule, but which would result in the destruction and anarchy of order and control, making it a state of extreme survival WILD OF THE STRONGEST, full of conflict, territorial disputes and murders.

Here we will follow the story of Goar, the last "Human" man, on his path of revenge, for a group of women who destroyed and traumatized his life forever, but this journey will not be easy for him, since he will encounter several obstacles and dangers on his path of revenge, but he will not be alone, but will also be accompanied by his traveling companion, Farah.

title.en: You Like Me, Not My Daughter?!

altTitles.ja: 娘じゃなくて私が好きなの!?
娘じゃなくて私(ママ)が好きなの!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Musume Janakute Mama ga Suki nano!?
Musume ja Nakute Mama ga Suki nano!?
Musume Janakute Watashi (Mama) ga Suki nano!?

altTitles.en: You Like Me (Mama), Not My Daughter!?

altTitles.zh: 喜欢的不是女儿而是我吗？

altTitles.pt-br: Você Gosta É De Mim (Mamãe) E Não Da Minha Filha?!

description.en:
“I will take in and raise this child.”

I'm Katsuragi Ayako, thirty-\*BEEP\* years old. It's been 10 years since I took in the daughter of my late sister and her husband. My daughter's now in high school and is getting on well with her childhood friend, Aterazawa Takumi. Maybe they'll start dating? Takumi's a really nice guy, so I'm all for it.

Eh? He has something to say to me? Is it something like “Please give me your daughter.”? No way, I'm getting ahead of myself.

“Ayako-mama…… I've always loved you. Please go out with me.”

“……You like me (mama), not my daughter!?”

A super pure-love romcom where long-held feelings explode!
___
**Character Designer:** [Giuniu](https://mangadex.org/author/657f488c-ba3d-4910-8ec3-539871b99fcc)

**Alt Official Raw:** [Young Animal Web](https://younganimal.com/series/5d1e949cd0b52)
description.pt-br: Esta é uma comédia romântica estrelada por uma mulher adulta de 30 anos chamada Ayako, que é confessada por um homem 10 anos mais novo dela, o estudante universitário de 20 anos, Takumi … Um homem que ela conhece como o menino "Ta-kun" que mora ao lado e que ensina sua filha adotiva desde os 10 anos. A revelação a espanta, pois ela pensava que sua filha Miu e ele eram um casal.

description.en:
In the country of Lavarta, mages are oppressed and seen as filthy beings. Leon is a talented but rather weak mage. Zechs is an orphan boy with great innate magical talent. Their meeting will change their lives as well as the world around them.

Note: "Lineage of sorcery" is the literal translation of the Japanese title, but it's not the official translation.
description.ja: 三流魔導士と孤独な少年。師弟を繋ぐ世界の理。　魔導士が虐げられる国ラバルタ。私塾を営む三流魔導士レオンは、身寄りのない少年ゼクスを託される。周囲を拒絶するゼクスに、レオンは師として歩み寄ろうとするが…。

description.en: The stage is the eve of the French Revolution. There is the commoner Gideon, who wants to save the impoverished country side-by-side with the members of the Estates General. Then there is the aristocrat, Georges, who will use any means to achieve his purpose. A man who wants to change the country, and a man who wants to destroy it. Both begin their journey forward. Will their joint efforts of love and hatred, justice and evil lead them to a hell of bloodshed, or an ideal future?

title.en: The Menhera Rabbit Is Adored by the Yandere Wolf

altTitles.ja: メンヘラうさぎはヤンデレ狼に溺愛される

description.en: A dangerous and twisted love between a menhera girl x yandere boy!? Tsumugi is a menhera girl who's been dumped by a string of boyfriends for being too clingy. Her last boyfriend got angry at her for sneakily looking through his phones and kicked her out of the house. And that's when Itoshi, the super kind younger guy who completely accepts her, comes to the rescue. His gentle comfort soothes Tsumugi's broken heart, however, there's something he's hiding...!?
description.ja: メンヘラ女子×ヤンデレ男子の危険で歪な恋!?　つむぎは歴代彼氏に「重すぎる」と捨てられてきたメンヘラ女子。彼氏のスマホを勝手に覗き怒られ、家から追い出されてしまう。そんな時助けてくれたのは、自分を全肯定してくれる超優しい年下の男の子、愛士。彼の優しい慰めで傷ついた心が安らぐつむぎだったが、愛士には秘密があって…!?

description.en:
The raid failed. 

In a desperate situation due to the impending suicide bombing of the dungeon boss, Lee Gon-woo was betrayed by his teammates, and abandoned in the boss’s room. Just when he thought it was all over, a dagger suddenly fell into his hands. And from that moment his life changed dramatically.

His life was saved, but all the levels he gained with such difficulty have reset, making him level 1.

[You have caught a "mosquito". Your level has increased.]

"My level should have gone up, but why is nothing happening?!"
description.ru:
Рэйд провалился. 
В отчаянном положении из-за готовящегося самоподрыва босса данжа преданный тиммейтами Ли Гон-у остался один в комнате босса.
Когда он думал, что уже всё кончено, неожиданно в его руки попадает кинжал. И с этого момента его жизнь кардинально меняется.
Его жизнь спасена, но он снова вернулся на первый уровень, который с таким трудом поднимал...
[Вы поймали "комара". Ваш уровень повышен.]
Действительно, уровень должен был подняться, но почему никаких изменений?

title.en: Imprisoned with the Horror Game's Male Lead

altTitles.en: Confined Together with the Horror Game’s Male Lead

altTitles.es-la: Me convertí en la sirvienta del protagonista de un juego de terror

description.en:
I became a maid inside of a horror game.
Penalties were given to the male lead, who was trying to escape being locked up in a large mansion, and I acted as a guide. 

I was going to fulfill my duties until the male lead’s play ends.

“When I get out, I’ll lock you up exactly the same way.”

The male lead is so noisy. 
If it’s going to be like this, I’ll just help him escape faster. 

“Let’s eat, Dietrich.”
“This is a potion, it’ll help you recover faster if you take it.”
“The hint to escape is over there…”

I fed him well to prepare for the next play, and when the male lead got hurt, I gave him a potion so he could quickly play the next game,
I even gave him a hint for the problem. 

You’ll be able to get out now, right?

However. 

“I don’t really know the answer.”

What’s the meaning of this? Aren’t you supposed to be smart?

…The male lead doesn’t think about leaving the mansion at all. 

“If you won’t get out, I will.”

I shouted in anger because I was so sick of the thought of having to see the face of someone I don’t want to keep seeing. 

“Is it possible for you to get out of here?”

His eyes sank bitterly. 

“Let me tell you this, I have no intention of leaving this place.”
“What?”
“And you have no way of getting out, either.”

What the hell is going on?

Kazuya Kagami, an ordinary boy, finds his life turned upside down when his late mother's obi transforms into a girl wearing a kimono named Kiriha. She happens to be a Tsukumogami called a "tsugumomo," objects that have gained a soul through long years of harmony with their owners. Kazuya has no recollection of meeting Kiriha when she exclaims "Long time no see" to him. He nearly loses his life from an attacking "amasogi" that are premature spirits born only to fulfill impure wishes of certain people, and Kiriha defends him. With Kiriha's arrival, Kazuya enters a reality with gods and other Tsukumogami and slowly discovers his dark past.
description.es: Los objetos que la gente ha usado durante mucho tiempo, llevan sentimientos en ellos, y se llaman 'tsukumogami'... Kazuya atesora un obi, un recuerdo de su madre, y lo lleva consigo en todo momento, hasta que un día es atacado por un misterioso objeto. ¡Fue el tsukumogami, Kiriha, quien le salvó en ese momento!
description.ja: 人が長く使い続けた物には想いが宿り、それを「付喪神」という…。母の形見の帯を大事にし、常に持ち歩いていた一也は、ある日、不可思議な物体に襲われてしまう。その時に助けてくれたのは、帯の付喪神・桐葉だった!!
description.ru: Действие сюжета разворачивается вокруг юноши по имени Кадзуя Кагами. Его мать дарит ему на память пояс оби с мотивами сакуры, и однажды из этого пояса возникает цукомогами — его дух. Странноватая голубоволосая девушка, представившаяся Кирихой, заявляет, что отныне Кадзуя является её рабом, что превращает его жизнь в настоящее испытание.
description.es-la: Los objetos que la gente ha usado durante mucho tiempo, llevan sentimientos en ellos, y se llaman 'tsukumogami'... Kazuya atesora un obi, un recuerdo de su madre, y lo lleva consigo en todo momento, hasta que un día es atacado por un misterioso objeto. ¡Fue el tsukumogami, Kiriha, quien le salvó en ese momento!
description.pt-br: Kazuya Kagami nunca vai a lugar algum sem o precioso "Sakura Obi" que sua mãe lhe deu. Um dia, uma bela garota, vestida com um Kimono, chamada Kiriha apareceu diante dele. Kiriha naturalmente começou a morar com Kazuya em seu quarto.Então há Chisato, a amiga de infância de Kazuya com óculos e rabo de cavalo, que se mete em seus assuntos. Logo, há também uma irmã mais velha superprotetora que parece querer tomar banho com ele. Atrapalhada com enormes peitos, uma sacerdotisa. uma feiticeira com boa aparência chamada Kokuyoura, lindas mulheres, garotas picantes e assim começa a vida feliz, confusa e embaraçosa de Kazuya!!!

title.en: Isekai Mokushiroku Mynoghra: Hametsu no Bunmei de Hajimeru Sekai Seifuku

altTitles.ja: 異世界黙示録マイノグーラ ～破滅の文明で始める世界征服～

altTitles.zh-hk: 異世界默示錄米諾戈拉 ～從滅亡的文明開始的世界征服～

altTitles.en: Apocalypse Bringer Mynoghra: World Conquest Starts with the Civilization of Ruin

description.en:
Bedridden and abandoned, Takuto Ira spent his days in the hospital trying to beat the illness that was slowly killing him. His only solace lay in the nation management strategy game Eternal Nations, where he had built a reputation as the greatest player to ever live. 

After succumbing to his disease, Takuto awoke within the game next to Atou — the Hero unit for his favorite civilization, Mynoghra. Now they’ll set out to conquer the world together (again), one unit, settlement, and level at a time!
description.pl: Ira Takuto umiera w młodym wieku i budzi się w świecie przypominającym jego ulubioną grę 『Eternal Nations』 w której spotyka postać z gry, Atou. Razem postanawiają stworzyć własne królestwo.
description.pt-br: Eu reencarnei como um deus do mal. Ira Takuto sucumbiu à doença em tenra idade e acabou reencarnando em um mundo que lembrava o jogo de simulação de estratégia, “Eternal Nations”, do qual ele adorava jogar quando estava vivo. O que apareceu na frente dele foi Atou, uma garota pertencente à civilização do mal que eu costumava interpretar como “Mynoghra”. Os dois decidiram criar um novo país neste mundo mais uma vez.

title.en: Aru Hi Totsuzen Message Window ga Hyoujisaretan desu kedo!?

altTitles.ja: ある日突然メッセージウィンドウが表示されたんですけど！？

altTitles.ja-ro: Aru Hi Totsuzen Message Window ga Hyouji Saretan desu kedo!?

altTitles.en: One Day a Message Window Appeared Out of Nowhere!?

description.en:
The protagonist, a university student named Kazuya Hayakawa woke up one day with a message window that shows up in his field of view. This window is always visible to him, and when certain lines are displayed in it, he gets thrown into confusion.

From that day onward began Hayakawa's daily ordeal of getting manipulated by this message window.

(Source: Amazon JP)
description.ja:
主人公・早川一哉はある日目が覚めるとメッセージウィンドウが見えるようになってしまった。
常に表示されるそのウィンドウにはとあるセリフが表示され主人公を混乱させる。

この日から早川一哉のメッセージウィンドウに振り回される苦難の日々が始まった。

altTitles.ja: 異形頭さんとニンゲンちゃん

altTitles.en: The Aberrant-Headed Guy and the Human Girl

description.en: The main character who got worked to the bone as a corporate slave office lady in the current world got transported to another world, where she became the pet of aberrant head-san. Although they both hold romantic feelings towards each other, it's hard for them to develop their love with their difference in species standing in the way.
description.uk: Наша головна героїня, втомлена життям корпоративного раба, потрапляє в інший світ і живе як домашня тваринка Гетероморфної Голови-сана. Вони обоє мають романтичні почуття одне до одного, які, втім, через расові відмінності не можуть розвиватися, хоча...

title.en: I'm Being Mistaken for a Soccer Genius

description.en: The Korean boy, Lee Jian, who was released from a prestigious youth team in Italy, spends his days idling away as a substitute even after arriving at the youth team of AC Firenze, almost as if he were running away.As usual, he boasts to his childhood friend, Kim Jiwoo, claiming to be a genius, but then he hears the shocking news that Jiwoo is coming to Italy to study abroad. Determined not to disappoint his precious (?) friend Jiwoo, Jian sets his sights on becoming a starter...

altTitles.ja: ストーカー×ストーカー

description.en:
Tsukita and Taiyou are close friends at university. One day, Taiyou is revealed to have been stalking Tsukita. However, it turns out Tsukita is also stalking Taiyou, even collecting his baby teeth...
A suspenseful (?) love comedy about two people stalking each other and having 'unrequited' love!

title.en: Shakaijin Yuri – Suu to Ame Matome

altTitles.ja: 社会人百合スゥとアメまとめ

altTitles.en: Working Women Yuri – Suu and Ame Collection

altTitles.vi: Bắt nạt mình đi mà, nữ phản diện ơi!

altTitles.th: โปรดรังแกฉันทีคุณนางร้าย!

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐng qīfù wǒ ba, è yì xiǎojiě!

altTitles.ru: Пожалуйста, поиздевайтесь надо мной, мисс Злодейка!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me humilhe, senhorita vilã!

altTitles.ar: !تنمرِ علي من فضلكِ يا أنسة الشر

altTitles.fr: Je vous en supplie madame l'antagoniste, Harcelez moi !

altTitles.ja: いじめてください、悪役令嬢様！

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

description.cs: Lidstvo bylo po stovky let utlačováno kvůli vzestupu a invazi našich přirozených nepřátel "démonů". Světu vládl "Velký král démonů" a jeho 47 "ďábelských vládců". Zatímco lidé žijí ve strachu, 47 lidí bylo vybráno z celého světa a zíkslai titul "Hrdinové" a připravují se na boj proti armádě velkého krále démonů. A nyní začíná plán jak zachránit lidstvo, jehož osud je teď na tenkém ledě.
description.en:
Centuries ago, humanity’s natural enemy, “Demons,” invaded the world and oppressed humankind. The Great Demon Lord and 47 subordinates known as Demon Lords have since dominated the world, while the human race lives on in fear.

In desperation, a last-ditch effort for humanity’s very survival is placed in the hands of 47 people gathered from across the world. These heroes will oppose the demon army and win back humanity’s freedom…or die trying!
___
**Compositor:** [bose](https://mangadex.org/author/aa8eb4f2-d4a2-4c4e-b6e8-2394f3b09b71)

**Alt Official English:** [K MANGA - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10569/episode/349625)
description.ja: 天敵“魔族”の台頭と侵攻により、人類が虐げられ続けて数百年。世界は“大魔王”と、その配下である47体の“魔王”により支配されていた。人々は怯えて暮らしながらも、世界中から選び抜かれた47人を“勇者”と名付け、魔王軍に対抗すべく準備を進めていた。そして今、人類の存亡を懸けた決死の作戦が始まろうとしていた―――。
description.ru:
Уже сотни лет человечество вынуждено существовать под гнётом своих естественных врагов — демонов, сумевших захватить мир. В их главе стоит Повелитель тьмы, и в подчинении его находятся сорок семь Королей.
Однако среди людей, чей дух сломлен вековым страхом, было отобрано столько же наречённых Героев, готовых сразиться с демонической армией. И, кажется, отчаянная борьба за судьбу человеческой расы начинается прямо сейчас...
description.pt-br: A humanidade foi oprimida por centenas de anos devido à ascensão e invasão do inimigo natural "demônios". O mundo era governado pelo "Grande Lorde Demônio" e seus 47 "Senhores Demônios". Enquanto as pessoas vivem com medo, 47 pessoas selecionadas de todo o mundo foram nomeadas "Heróis" e estão se preparando para lutar contra o exército do Rei Demônio. E agora, uma operação desesperada com a sobrevivência da humanidade em jogo estava prestes a começar.

altTitles.es: El hombre de un solo golpe

altTitles.th: วันพันช์แมน

description.en:
After rigorously training for three years, the ordinary Saitama has gained immense strength which allows him to take out anyone and anything with just one punch. He decides to put his new skill to good use by becoming a hero. However, he quickly becomes bored with easily defeating monsters, and wants someone to give him a challenge to bring back the spark of being a hero.  
  
Upon bearing witness to Saitama's amazing power, Genos, a cyborg, is determined to become Saitama's apprentice. During this time, Saitama realizes he is neither getting the recognition that he deserves nor known by the people due to him not being a part of the Hero Association. Wanting to boost his reputation, Saitama decides to have Genos register with him, in exchange for taking him in as a pupil. Together, the two begin working their way up toward becoming true heroes, hoping to find strong enemies and earn respect in the process.  
  



---

**Notes:**  
- Because some groups use the web version of the manga while others use the magazine version, the numbering won't match between different languages.  
- **Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, fan translations of One Punch Man are currently unavailable to be uploaded. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-punch-man) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US).**
description.fa: در جهان اَبَر قهرمان ها قهرمانی بسیار قدرتمند و شکست ناپذیر وجود داره که به (مرد تک مشتی) معروفه چون اون تمامی دشمنان و رقیب هاشو فقط با یک مشت از میدان به در میکنه. بعد از مدتی سایتاما  دیگه از مبارزاتش لذت نمیبره و احساساتی مثل هیجان و ترس رو در خودش فراموش میکنه! و همراه تنها شاگردش که یک سایبورگ هست به انتظار رقیبی خوب ، ماجراهایی رو دنبال میکنن و……
description.ru: Манга повествует о молодом человеке по имени Сайтама. Он — герой, обычный герой. Основная его проблема в том, что он вышибает дух из злодеев одним ударом. А это очень скучно…
description.tr:
Üç yıllık sıkı bir eğitimden sonra, Saitama, tek bir yumrukla herkesi ve her şeyi alt etmesine izin veren muazzam bir güç kazandı. Bir kahraman olarak yeni becerisini iyi bir şekilde kullanmaya karar verir. Bununla birlikte, canavarları kolayca yenmekten çabucak sıkılır ve kahraman olma kıvılcımını geri getirmek için birinin ona meydan okumasını ister.
  Bir cyborg olan Genos, Saitama'nın inanılmaz gücüne tanık olduktan sonra, Saitama'nın çırağı olmaya kararlıdır. Bu süre zarfında Saitama, Kahraman Derneği'nin bir parçası olmadığı için ne hak ettiği takdiri görmediğini ne de insanlar tarafından tanınmadığını fark eder. İtibarını artırmak isteyen Saitama, Genos'u öğrenci olarak alması karşılığında kendisine kaydettirmeye karar verir. İkisi birlikte, güçlü düşmanlar bulmayı ve bu süreçte saygı kazanmayı umarak gerçek kahramanlar olma yolunda ilerlemeye başlar.
description.pt-br: One-Punch Man conta a história de Saitama, um super-herói extremamente poderoso, que se entediou com a ausência dos desafios nas suas lutas contra o mau e procura encontrar um oponente digno para lutar.

altTitles.th: สนามเด็กล่า

altTitles.pt-br: Uma Sensação de Diversão com seus brinquedos

description.en:
Lee Myung-jun, the Vice Chairman of Hyundo Group, lost his daughter to a group of bullies. Seeking revenge, he adopts Yoon Karma, a psychopathic defector girl.

Yoon Karma: A sadistic human weapon created through drug experiments in North Korea. After killing everyone in the research lab, she escaped to South Korea on her own.

Having just been released from a juvenile detention center in South Korea, Yoon Karma sets out to hunt down the bullies at school, driven by the desire to avenge her new father and satisfy her sadistic pleasures.
description.pt-br:
Lee Myung-jun, o vice-presidente do grupo Hyundo, perdeu sua filha para um grupo de pessoas que faziam bullying. Buscando vingança, ele adota Yoon Karma, uma garota desertora psicopata.
Yoon Karma: Uma arma humana sádica criada por meio de experimentos com drogas na Coreia do Norte. Depois de matar todos no laboratório de pesquisa, ela escapou para a Coreia do Sul sozinha.
Tendo acabado de ser libertada de um centro de detenção juvenil na Coreia do Sul, Yoon Karma sai para caçar os valentões na escola, movida pelo desejo de vingar seu novo pai e satisfazer seus prazeres sádicos.

title.en: Ore no tomodachi ♂♀ ga kawai sugite komaru!

altTitles.ja: 俺の友達♂♀が可愛すぎて困る！

altTitles.en: My Childhood Friend Is So Cute, It's Frustrating!
I Am Worried That My Childhood Friend Is Too Cute!

altTitles.vi: Người bạn thời thơ ấu của tôi quá dễ thương!

description.en: "If my guy friend turned into a girl, he would be the perfect girlfriend!" Returning to his hometown after 10 years, Amano Koichi is thrilled to finally reunite with his childhood friend, Yukio Sawatari on the first day of school when suddenly, he turns female! Yukio is affected by "Sudden sex change syndrome", a rare condition present in one every ten thousand people which randomly changes their gender!Koichi can't help but be flustered by his childhood friend's cuteness. How will this complicate their relationship? Will it develop into a forbidden romance?! Find out in this exciting TSF Rom-com!
description.id:
Amano, yang kembali ke kota tempat dia tinggal sewaktu kecil untuk pertama kalinya setelah 10 tahun, bertemu Yukio Sawatari, seorang teman masa kecil di hari pertama pemindahan, ketika dia (seorang teman pria) menjadi wanita! Meskipun dia berbagi suka citanya, saat dia tiba-tiba berubah menjadi seorang gadis dan tidak bisa menyembunyikan rasa malunya. Yukio terkena penyakit seperti 100.000 orang lainnya, tiba-tiba menjadi seorang gadis yang disebut "spontaneous isomerism metamorphosis"!  
  
Teman masa kecil perempuan ♂ yang imut dan dalam kesulitan!? Cinta TSF (transeksual) Terlarang!  
  
Kalo gak paham baca ajalah, ada sinopsis juga gak guna.
description.vi:
Khi trở về thành phố nơi từng sống sau 10 năm, Amano Koichi đã gặp lại người bạn tuổi thơ là Yukio Sawatari vào ngày đầu tiên ở trường mới thì bỗng nhiên Yukio lại đổi giới tính?! Anh bị ảnh hưởng bởi một căn bệnh chỉ có trong một trong mười nghìn người gọi là "hội chứng đổi giới đột ngột"! 

Từ đây bắt đầu câu truyện về tình yêu với người bạn tuổi thơ đổi giới.

title.en: Jitsu wa Imouto deshita. ~Saikin Dekita Giri no Otouto no Kyorikan ga Yatara Chikai Wake~

altTitles.ja: じつは義妹でした。～最近できた義理の弟の距離感がやたら近いわけ～

altTitles.en: She Was Actually My Stepsister.: Recently, the Sense of Distance Between Me and My New Stepbrother Is Incredibly Close

altTitles.id: Dia Sebenarnya Adik Perempuanku ~Baru-baru ini, Jarak Antara Diriku dan Adik Laki-lakiku Semakin Dekat~

altTitles.ru: На самом деле она была моей сводной сестрой

altTitles.es-la: En realidad era mi hermanastra ~Recientemente, la sensación de distancia entre mi nuevo hermanastro y yo es increíblemente cercana~

description.en:
Akira, my stepbrother, was brought into my life as a high school student after my parents remarried. He is a cute boy but shy because of the complicated family environment he grew up in. I had a crush on my brother, so I always spent time playing with Akira for his sake... He loves me... We hit it off, and the distance between us grew rapidly! I asked him, "......Brother, do you like me by any chance?" "Of course I do."

The misunderstanding between the two of us deepens. And finally, I realized that Akira was my "sister" and I was confused... "I like the distance between my brother and me as we have always been. I'd rather be with you more than I am now." Akira's approach to me, aiming to make us "lovers" instead of "siblings", has begun!
 ___

**Links:**
- [Official Light Novel (JP)](https://fantasiabunko.jp/special/202111jitsuimo)
description.ja: 親の再婚で、高校生の俺にできた義理の弟・晶。複雑な家庭環境で育ったせいで、美少年だけど人見知り。兄「弟」に憧れていた俺は、晶といつも一緒に遊んで過ごしていたけど、じつは俺たちは兄「妹」だと判明し…!?
description.es-la: ¿Una relación secreta entre un hermano y su hermana pequeña? ¡Comienza una comedia romántica entre hermanos con un malentendido! Akira, mi hermanastro, llegó a mi vida después de que mis padres se volvieran a casar. Es un chico lindo pero tímido debido al entorno familiar donde creció. ¡Nos llevamos bien, y le pregunté: "Hermano, ¿te gusto por casualidad?" "Por supuesto que sí". El malentendido entre los dos se profundiza. Y finalmente, me di cuenta de que Akira era mi "hermana" y me confundí... El acercamiento de Akira a mí, con el objetivo de convertirnos en "amantes" en lugar de "hermanos", ¡ha comenzado! ¡Una coqueta comedia romántica con una hermana pequeña que es demasiado linda y despreocupada!
description.pt-br:
***Um relacionamento secreto de irmão mais novo com sua irmã mais nova?! Começa uma comédia romântica entre irmãos com um mal-entendido!**

Akira, meu meio-irmão, entrou em minha vida quando era estudante do ensino médio, depois que meus pais se casaram novamente. Ele é um menino fofo, mas tímido por causa do ambiente familiar complicado em que cresceu. Eu tinha uma queda pelo meu irmão, então sempre passava um tempo brincando com Akira por causa dele…. Ele me ama… Nós nos demos bem e a distância entre nós cresceu rapidamente! Eu perguntei a ele,
"Mano, você gosta de mim por acaso?"
"Claro que sim."
O mal-entendido entre nós dois se aprofunda. E finalmente, percebi que Akira era minha “irmã” e fiquei confuso...
"Gosto da distância entre meu irmão e eu, como sempre estivemos. Prefiro estar com você mais do que estou agora."
A abordagem de Akira para mim, com o objetivo de nos tornar “amantes” em vez de “irmãos”, já começou!
Uma comédia romântica sedutora com uma irmã mais nova que é muito fofa e despreocupada para ser irmão!

altTitles.en: I Want to Hold Aono-kun so Badly I Could Die
I Want to Die Because I Want to Touch Aono

altTitles.zh: 想要触碰青野君所以我想死

altTitles.zh-hk: 想要觸碰青野君所以我想死

altTitles.ja: 青野くんに触りたいから死にたい

altTitles.ko: 아오노 군과 닿고 싶으니까 죽고 싶어

altTitles.fr: Je meurs d’envie de toucher Aono-kun

description.en: "I would die if it would allow me to touch you. That is my love." Airhead Yuri and her boyfriend Aono had a perfectly normal relationship until one day Aono suddenly “passed away” … They will never be bound together, and they cannot even touch. This is their difficult and almost too sincere love story.
description.ja: 君に触れるなら、死んでもいいよ。これがわたしの愛なんだ。天然少女・優里ちゃんと、その彼氏・青野くん。ごく普通のお付き合いをしていたふたりだが、ある日突然、青野くんが「いなくなって」しまう……。
description.vi:
Nếu là vì để được chạm vào cậu thì tớ chết cũng chẳng sao. Nghe kỳ lắm nhỉ? Nhưng đây là tình yêu của tớ. Tớ thích cậu nhiều lắm, Aono-kun!

Yuri-chan và bạn trai của cô ấy, Aono-kun, đã có một mối tình tuyệt vời cho đến một ngày, Aono-kun bỗng dưng qua đời... Họ sẽ không bao giờ đến được với nhau, và họ không thể chạm vào nhau. Đây là một câu chuyện về tình yêu chân thành nhưng cũng đầy những chông gai.

description.en: Though magic has been forbidden for many long years, the effects of spells woven in bygone wars still remain in pockets of corruption blighting the world today. To uncover the secrets in the hidden reaches of this world and become the wise-woman of her dreams, "Lucky" Solte sets out for adventure!

altTitles.en: Hellsing: The Legend of a Vampire Hunter
The Legend of a Vampire Hunter
The Legend of the Vampire Hunter

description.en:
Vampires exist. It is the duty of Hellsing, an organization sponsored by the British government, to hide that frightening fact and protect the blissfully unaware populace. Along with its own personal army, Hellsing also has a few secret weapons. Alucard, an incredibly powerful vampire, has been controlled by Hellsing for years. Although he dislikes being a servant to the Hellsing family, he certainly enjoys his job as Hellsing's vampire exterminator. Seras is a fledgling vampire and a former police woman. Although reluctant to embrace her new self, she is still a valuable member of the organisation. Integra Hellsing, the current leader, is usually fully capable of fulfilling her duty, but lately, vampire activity has been on the rise. Unfortunately, the cause is more alarming than anything she could have imagined. A group long thought dead has been plotting in secret since their apparent destruction over 50 years ago. Plotting to plunge England, and perhaps the entire world, into war.  


---
description.es: La familia Van Helsing ha sido la némesis del conde Drácula y de toda la raza de vampiros.Ahora se ha convertido en toda una organización cuyo mejor cazador,un vampiro,usará el humor y la violencia para cumplir su destino...y ha dado origen a una exitosa serie de animación.
description.fr: En Angleterre, l'organisation secrète Hellsing agit pour protéger le pays des forces du mal, dont les vampires. Force de frappe de l'Église protestante, ce groupe dispose d'une arme secrète des plus inattendues: Alucard, vampire surpuissant et apparemment invulnérable. Mais leur mission se corsera quand ils devront faire face au Vatican et aux brigades anti-monstres de l'État le plus petit du monde...
description.hu: A Hellsing Királyi Protestáns Lovagrend az Angol Korona évszázados szervezete – egy család, amelynek a feladata a birodalom védelme a természetfeletti és istentelen veszedelmektől. A lovagrend lelke Sir Integra Wingates Hellsing, legfőbb fegyvere pedig Alucard, a szervezet szolgálatában álló titokzatos ősvámpír, valamint – újabban – Seras Victoria, egy balul elsült bevetésen született vámpírlány.
description.it: Londra, un'antica casata nobiliare combatte contro i vampiri da generazioni; si tratta dell'agenzia segreta HELLSING, comandata da Lady Integra Farbuke Wingates Hellsing.Integra, succeduta alla morte del padre, stipula un patto di sangue con il on il vampiro Alucard e lo induce a battersi contro le tremende forze occulte che minacciano il pianeta, dando vita a una delle saghe horror più famose nel panorama dei manga.
description.ja: 幽霊船デメテル号に乗ってアーカードが遂に来た！かくして役者は全員演壇へと登り、暁の惨劇は幕を上げる・・・・・・
description.lt:
Kažkur Anglijoje gyvuoja slapta organizacija, sukurta tam, kad apgintų karalienę ir šalį nuo įvairiausio plauko pabaisų. Sveiki atvykę į paslaptingąjį Hellsing – organizaciją, kuri žino, kaip spręsti problemas, kai iš tamsos išnyra vampyrai, gūlai ir kitokios šlykštynės. Be to, organizacijos nariai gali pasigirti puikiu ginklu.

Klausiate, kokiu? Ogi kitu vampyru, kuris šimtmečius tobulino savąjį kovos meną ir todėl yra bemaž neįveikiamas. Apsiginklavęs milžinišku pistoletu, užtaisytu ypatingomis sidabrinėmis kulkomis, Alukardas kelia siaubą ne tik nemirėliams. Tačiau ne tai svarbiausia. Skaitytoją visų pirma priblokš kandus šių istorijų sąmojis, neįtikėtinos iliustracijos ir beprotiškai kruvinas veiksmas. Nenuostabu, jog ši manga užkariavo visą pasaulį.
description.pt: Para resolver o caso de um estranho pastor de hábitos macabros, é chamada a Organização Hellsing, responsável por livrar a Inglaterra dos males que espreitam na noite. Alucard é a principal arma da Hellsing contra estes seres, e sua história se cruza com a da novata Seras Victoria e a da chefe da organização, Integra Wingates Hellsing.
description.ru: Вампир Алукард - древний и могущественный, вампир "в самом расцвете сил". Все что его интересует - это поиски по-настоящему сильного противника. Убивать и умирать - какие еще могут быть развлечения в бессмертной жизни? И организация "Хеллсинг", члены которой посвятили себя борьбе с порождениями тьмы вроде него. Что может их связывать кроме желания уничтожить друг друга? Но, как ни странно, Алукард и Хеллсинг прекрасно работают вместе… и будут работать ровно до тех пор, пока древний вампир не найдет для себя действительно могущественного и интересного врага.
description.tr:
Hortlaklar, vampirler, canavarlar... Kraliyet Protestan Şövalyeler Kardeşliği, yani Hellsing, onlarla kadim zamanlardan beri mücadele ediyor. Nasıl mı? Tabii ki yüksek teknoloji ürünü silahlar ve ekipmanla... Üstelik bunları kullanan kişi tam bir vampir uzmanı. Hellsing sizi aksiyon ve kan yüklü bir dünyaya davet ediyor.

Bu sayıda Hellsing Organizasyonu'nun avlarıyla ve düşmanlarıyla tanışıyoruz. Hiç beklenmeyen bazı gelişmeler, Integra Hellsing'in tüm planlarını bozuyor. Üstelik, kurumun yakın geçmişinde yaşanan güç oyunları ve entrikalar da karşımıza çıkıyor. Bakalım Hellsing bütün bu olanlarla başa çıkabildi mi ve olacaklarla başa çıkabilecek mi?
description.es-la: Llega uno de los mayores éxitos de los últimos años! Hellsing, una organización auspiciada por el gobierno británico, controlada por la implacable Integra, busca exterminar a los despiadados vampiros, cuya actividad va en aumento y causa pánico en la población. Su principal arma es Alucard, un sádico vampiro liberado por Integra después de años de reclusión. Junto a él, Victoria Seras, una chica policía ahora mitad vampiro. El peligro? Una posible guerra mundial. Mucho más explícito, violento, humorístico y adulto que la serie de TV.

title.en: Latna Saga: Survival of a Sword King

altTitles.en: The Survival Story of the Sword King in Another World

altTitles.ru: История выживания короля меча в фэнтезийном мире

altTitles.th: การเอาชีวิตรอดของราชาดาบในต่างโลก

altTitles.en: Survival Story of a Sword King in a Fantasy World

description.en:
After being recently discharged from military service and just drifting through life, Hanbin Ryu is suddenly transported to another world.

However, his “guide line,” the system bestowed upon him to help with his survival and growth, was filled with errors, causing him to be stuck in the tutorial stage for over 20 years.

When he is finally released from this personal hell, he finds everyone has turned against otherworlders like him. Just how will this low-level, super-tutorial newbie survive?

---

**Links:**
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mLzbAKkDpYM)
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EA%B3%84-%EA%B2%80%EC%99%95-%EC%83%9D%EC%A1%B4%EA%B8%B0/2363)

description.fr: Transféré contre sa volonté dans un tutoriel où il doit lutter pour survivre, Ryu Hanbin y reste finalement coincé pendant 22 ans. Il est bloqué par un bug au niveau 4, et ce malgré la grande quantité d'XP qu'il accumule ! Quand il est finalement transféré dans le monde de Latna, le contraste entre sa puissance et son niveau lui pose bien des difficultés. Mais finalement, le véritable objectif n'est-il pas de vivre plutôt que de survivre ?
description.ja: ｢あなたは適合者として選ばれました｣ ｢あなたの能力でセルハラトナに生き残る確率は５％未満です｣ ｢自殺しますか？」 ニート生活から突如として異世界へ飛ばされた！そこはレベル5までを目指す初心者エリアだったが、「ガイドライン」のエラーでレベル5になっても再びレベル1になるという、地獄の日々を送ることになり？！ レベル5の裏に隠された、とてつもない能力とはー
description.ko:
『귀하는 적합자로 선택받았습니다』

『귀하의 재능으로 셀하 라트나에서 생존할 확률은 5% 미만입니다』

『자살하시겠습니까? Y/N』

“x-까.”

5% 미만의 생존 확률. 22년의 시간. 셀 수도 없는 마견과의 사투.
이 지옥에서, 나는 홀로 살아남았다.

5라는 레벨 뒤에 감춰진, 무지막지한 히든 스탯들과 함께!

대검 하나로 이계를 썰어버리는,
사상 최강의 레벨5 검사 류한빈의 극한 사이다 생존기!
description.ru: В момент, когда его переместили в другой мир, Рю Хан-Бин был обычным человеком, который недавно вернулся из армии. Хоть он и остался один в пустынном мире с кучей монстров, ему дали задание - стать сильнее. Но есть одна проблема - "система", которая должна была давать подсказки, полна недоработок.
description.th:
รยูฮันบิน ชายผู้เพิ่งปลดประจำการทหารมาได้เพียงสามเดือน จู่ๆ ก็ถูกพาไปยังโลกแปลกๆ ที่เขาไม่รู้จักมาก่อน ชื่อว่า 'เซลฮา แลตนา'
พร้อมมีข้อความขึ้นว่า ""คุณได้รับเลือกในฐานะผู้เข้าเกณฑ์อันทรงเกียรติ"" พร้อมกับไกด์ไลน์ที่บอกให้สู้กับมอนสเตอร์ และเพิ่มให้ถึงเลเวล 5 เพื่อไปยังพื้นที่ถัดไป แต่ด้วยระบบเกิดข้อผิดพลาด ทำให้เขาต้องติดอยู่ในนั้นนับสิบปี ที่นั่นมีเพียงเขาแค่คนเดียวกับสุนัขปีศาจ
อยู่มาวันหนึ่งเขาสามารถเพิ่มถึงเลเวล 5 ได้สำเร็จ และถูกส่งไปยังพื้นที่ต่อไปแบบไม่ทันตั้งตัว

การผจญภัยเพื่อหาทางเอาชีวิตรอดในต่างโลกของเขาได้เริ่มต้นขึ้นแล้ว
เขาจะหาทางออกไปจากโลกแห่งนี้ และมีชีวิตรอดไปได้หรือไม่
description.zh: 一个俗套的穿越后带挂升级故事，却因为外挂系统的运算错误而偏离方向。 渴望变强的他被困在新手村二十年，不断的战斗却始终无法提升等级。 九亿次拔剑，九亿次搏杀，他脚踩着尸山血海缓步走来。 “恭喜，您即将被传送出新手村…” 蛰伏的凶兽露出爪牙，万物都将屈服于他拔剑的光辉之下！
description.zh-hk:
「依照你的能力，
你在瑟哈拉特那活下來的機率低於5%。」

「你要自殺嗎? Yes or No?」

「三X啊。」

不到5%的生存機率、22年的時間、
與魔犬纏鬥了無數次，
我一個人...在這座地獄中生存了下來。

在5等的背後，潛藏著無比強大的隱藏數值!

帶著一把巨劍殺爆異界，堪稱史上最強的5等劍士，
柳寒頻生存記，看了保證超過癮!

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

Utsumi is your everyday student. He is also a boy that has always had a strong sense of what is right in the world. With nothing but innocence and a mind that longs for his "significant other," Utsumi takes on one of the toughest subjects: love. With the help of the devious and mysterious Kurokawa Yuki, will Utsumi learn how to be fortunate in the game of love? Only through the ups and downs of real life, and the assistance of his friends, will Utsumi be able to take a bite out of life and learn just what love is.

- Alternative English: [Kodansha US](https://kodansha.us/series/ge-good-ending)

altTitles.en: How to train your brainrot girlfriend

altTitles.es-la: Tengo una novia con la percepción de la realidad alterada

altTitles.vi: Bạn gái bại não của tôi

description.en:
She's cute! She's beautiful! She's sexy! She... speaks in tongues? Meet the Brainrot Girlfriend! She means well, but good luck understanding what she says. 
Brainrot translation: shes skibidi shes toilet shes roblox she girl math goat bussing this better caul saul mrbeast metal pipe falling the roblox amogus she gigachad glazer but colleen ballinger nonchalant poppy playtime what she roblox L rn
description.tl: Ang cute niya! Ang ganda niya! Ang seksi niya! At siya ay... nagsasalita ng iba't ibang wika? Sa Vietnamese na manga na ito, kilalanin ang Jowang utakbulok! Mabuti ang kanyang intensyon, pero swerte na lang kung maiintindihan mo ang sinasabi niya.

description.en:
A manga adaptation of the popular “TRUMP series” by playwright Kenichi Suemitsu.

Angelico and Raphael, childhood friends, reunite in the clan during their Cocoon period. They also meet Diego, Emile, and Julio, who are upperclassmen, and develop a friendly relationship, but their friendship is shattered by an incident. The story of boys guided together by blood, their short-lived friendships, and tales of profound sorrow-!!

altTitles.en: TONIKAWA: Over The Moon For You

description.en:
Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but…

Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.
description.ru:
Тяжело жить, если родители дали тебе имя НАСА - да, как NASA, и каждый второй спрашивает, пойдешь ли ты в астронавты. Еще тяжелее, если в один день тебя собьет грузовик, ты встретишь любовь всей своей жизни и тут же ее потеряешь, согласившись жениться на ней. Мужик сказал, что женится - значит женись. И заверьте… Веселая комедия положений без особой логики, но с неожиданными поворотами сюжета. Ведь жена и правда с Луны?..   
  
**Tonikaku Cawaii is the official romanization.**
description.pt-br: Aceito sair com você se você se casar comigo.

description.en:
After being aggressively rejected, Momo Ayase finds herself sulking when she stumbles across a boy being bullied. Saved by her rash kindness, the occult-obsessed boy attempts to speak to her about supernatural interests he believes they share. Rejecting his claims, Ayase proclaimed that she is instead a believer in ghosts, starting an argument between the two over which is real.

In a bet to determine who's correct, the two decide to separately visit locations associated with both the occult and the supernatural—Ayase visiting the former and the boy visiting the latter. When the two reach their respective places, it turns out that neither of them was wrong and that both the occult and ghosts do exist.

This marks the beginning of Ayase and the boy's adventure, who shares a name with Ayase's favorite idol—Ken Takakura, as they attempt to fix the surreal supernatural and sci-fi elements around them to return to a normal life.
description.fr:
Momo Ayase et Ken Takakura sont tous deux lycéens. Tandis que la première croit aux fantômes, le second est fasciné par les extraterrestres. Évidemment, chacun se moque des croyances de l’autre. Incapables de se convaincre, ils se lancent un défi pour savoir lequel des deux a raison. Momo se retrouve dans un hôpital où des créatures de l’espace sont censées se trouver et Ken dans un tunnel hanté. C’est le début d’une romance survoltée où l’occulte, le paranormal et le surnaturel se bousculent dans un chaos haletant !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**
description.ja: 幽霊肯定派の女子校生・綾瀬桃と、同級生の怪奇現象オタク・オカルト君。互いに否定するUFOと怪異を信じさせるため、桃はUFOスポットの病院廃墟へ、オカルト君は心霊スポットのトンネルへ行くのだが…。運命の恋が始まる!?
description.ru: Призраки, монстры, инопланетяне, подростковая романтика, сражения!.. В этой серии есть все! Такакура, одержимый оккультизмом, не верящий в призраков, и Аясэ, девушка, не верящая в пришельцев, пытаются преодолеть свои разногласия, когда сталкиваются с паранормальными явлениями! Эта манга - не от мира сего!
description.uk:
Чорти, чудовиська, позаземці, підлітковий роман, махачі та дідько б їх узяв… раковини! У цій манзі ви знайдете все!

Окультний фанбой Такакура, його подруга Аясе та їх надприродні пригоди у новій психоломній манзі!
description.pt-br: Takakura, um rapaz que é um fanático do ocultismo que não acredita em fantasmas, e Ayase, uma garota que não acredita em alienígenas, encontram uma estranheza esmagadora que transcende sua compreensão mútua…! Uma história de vinda oculta da idade!

altTitles.ja: 君のラブを見せてくれ！

altTitles.zh-ro: Xiàng wǒ zhǎnlù nǐ de ài

altTitles.vi: Hãy cho tôi thấy tình yêu của cậu

description.en: Komichi Shijou, the most famous person at her school, was troubled. Despite being a romantic comedy manga artist, she had no understanding of 'the feeling of love' was stuck in a creative slump. One day, a certain boy and girl appear before her. With their arrival, Komichi Shijou's investigation into 'genuine love' begins…!?
description.ja: 学校イチの有名人・四條恋路は悩んでました。なぜならラブコメ漫画家なのに、彼女には“恋する気持ち”がまったくわからず、スランプになってしまったからです。 そんな彼女の前にひと組の男女が現れます。その男女との出会いにより、彼女・四條恋路による“ホンモノの恋”への探求が始まるのでした…！？『恋愛』を綴る天才漫画家少女はホンモノの“恋”を知らないーー！？
description.pt-br: Komichi Shijou, a pessoa mais famosa da escola, estava preocupada. Apesar de ser uma artista de mangá de comédia romântica, ela não tinha nenhuma compreensão do "sentimento do amor" e estava presa em uma crise criativa. Um dia, um certo garoto e uma garota aparecem diante dela. Com a chegada deles, a investigação de Komichi Shijou sobre o "amor genuíno" começa...!?

title.en: Hyperdimension Neptunia: The Animation - (DNA Comic Anthology)

altTitles.ja: 超次元ゲイム ネプテューヌ コミックアンソロジー (DNAメディアコミックス)

altTitles.ja-ro: Choujigen Game Neptune: The Animation - DNA Comic Anthology

description.en: An anthology comic of Choujigen Game Neptune (Hyperdimension Neptunia) by various mangaka published by DNA Media Comics Media.

title.en: I Look Too Much Like the Boss and the World Actually Believes It

altTitles.zh: 长的太像BOSS，结果世人真的信了

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhang De Tai Xiang BOSS, Jieguo Shiren Zhen De Xinle
Zhǎng De Tài Xiàng BOSS, Jiéguǒ Shìrén Zhēn De Xìnle

altTitles.en: The Appearance Is So BOSS-like, yet Everyone Believes It

description.en: Moon Lord, Suliang! Tamer of the Divine Lunar Morpho Butterfly, a familiar with abilities to control time and space, yin and yang, I am the invincible youth that stands at the apex of this world! To get such a status upon reincarnation is like getting dealt Pocket Aces… Divine my Arse! The beast in my body is nothing like the Divine Lunar Morpho! It’s clearly the lowest of low level Flash Butterfly!!! Facing millions of fanatical believers, a death match with Emperor Cangyue in three years time, and various sects viewing me as a thorn in their side… This is really an unprecedented beast tamer crisis!
description.zh: 月之王，苏凉！操纵着能回溯时空、逆转阴阳的月神闪蝶，以此站在这个世界的顶点的无敌少年！ 穿越而来就拿到这么NB的身份卡，岂不是天胡开局……个屁咧！ 我体内的宠兽，哪是什么月神闪蝶！！根本只是个只能照明的最最最低阶的闪光蝶！！！ 面对数以百万的狂热信徒、三年后约战的沧月大帝、视自己为眼中钉的各大教派…… 这还真是…… 前所未有的御兽大危机！

description.en:
The strongest swordsman of the Warring States period, transferred to another world.

At the end of the Warring States Period, Ginko, the greatest swordsman of the time, was always hungry for a fight to the death with someone stronger than herself. After cutting and cutting and cutting, she finally despairs that there is no one stronger than her in this world, and then she is transferred to another world! Before her eyes - a dragon!
description.ja:
戦国時代最強の剣豪、異世界転移。

戦国時代末期、最強の剣豪・ギンコは常に、自分より強いものとの死闘に飢えていた。切って切って切りまくり、ついにこの世に自分以上の強者がいないと絶望した矢先、異世界へ転移！　目の前には――ドラゴン！？
description.pt-br:
A espadachim mais forte do período dos Reinos Combatentes, transferida para outro mundo.

No final do Período dos Reinos Combatentes, Ginko, a maior espadachim da época, estava sempre ansiosa por lutar até a morte com alguém mais forte que ela. Depois de cortar e cortar e cortar, ela finalmente se desespera porque não há ninguém mais forte do que ela neste mundo, e então ela é transferida para outro mundo! Diante de seus olhos está um dragão!

altTitles.th: เชิญร่ำสุรา

description.en: The Six Prefectures of Zhongbo were ceded away in surrender to the external enemies, and Shen Zechuan was taken into custody in the capital, reduced to a drowning dog loathed and condemned by all. Xiao Chiye followed the scent of the furor and made his way over. But instead of setting others on him, he kicked Shen Zechuan with his very own leg that rendered the latter an invalid. Who would expect this invalid to turn around and bite him in a counterattack until he was all drenched in blood? That was the start of an epic feud between both men who tear at each other every time they come face-to-face with one another.
description.pl:
Shen Zechuan jest ósmym synem zdradzieckiego księcia Jianxing, człowieka, który skazał swoje miasta i ludzi na zagładę z rąk wroga. Jako jedyny żyjący członek swojej linii, Shen Zechuan jest znienawidzony przez cały naród. A nienawiść nikogo nie płonie goręcej niż uczucie Xiao Chiye, najmłodszego syna potężnego księcia Libei.

Xiao Chiye niczego nie pragnie bardziej niż śmierci Shen Zechuana, ale ten wbrew wszelkim przeciwnościom trzyma się życia. Zamiast poddać się hańbie swojej rodziny, staje się cierniem w boku Xiao Chiye, wdzierając się do bezwzględnego świata politycznego stolicy. Jednak gdy ci dwaj zaciekli wrogowie walczą z więzami swojego losu, zostają przyciągnięci do siebie siłą, której żaden z nich się nie spodziewa — i żaden z nich nie może mieć nadziei, że się jej oprze.

title.en: Kaji Daikou no Arubaito wo Hajimetara Gakuen Ichi no Bishoujo no Kazoku ni Kiniirarechaimashita

altTitles.ja: 家事代行のアルバイトを始めたら学園一の美少女の家族に気に入られちゃいました。

altTitles.en: I Started Working a Housekeeping Job and Ended up Being Liked by the Family of the Most Beautiful Girl in School

altTitles.pt-br: Comecei a trabalhar como empregado doméstico e acabei sendo apreciado pela família da garota mais bonita da escola

description.en:
My Part-Time Job is at the House of the Cutest Girl in School. A Shy and Awkward Housekeeping Rom-Com with the School Idol!

During his second year of high school, Haruto Otsuki starts a part-time job in housekeeping during the summer vacation. His first client turns out to be none other than Ayaka Tojo, the most beautiful girl in school! Despite being bewildered by this unexpected turn of events, Haruto continues doing his housekeeping duties. Over time, he becomes well-liked by Ayaka's family and begins regularly visiting her house.

From making home-cooked meals that delight Ayaka, to going grocery shopping together like a newlywed couple, and even going on shy movie dates like young lovers, they begin to grow closer by spending these special moments outside of school. This charming and awkward housekeeping rom-com featuring the most innocent and beautiful girl in school and a secretly high-spec guy begins!
description.id:
Pekerjaan Paruh Waktuku Ada di Rumah Gadis Termanis di Sekolah. Komedi Romantis Pemalu dan Canggung dengan Sang Idola Sekolah!
Selama tahun kedua sekolah menengahnya, Haruto Otsuki memulai pekerjaan paruh waktu sebagai pembantu rumah tangga selama liburan musim panas. Klien pertamanya ternyata tidak lain adalah Ayaka Tojo, gadis tercantik di sekolah! Meskipun bingung dengan kejadian tak terduga ini, Haruto terus melakukan tugas-tugas pembantu rumah tangganya. Seiring berjalannya waktu, ia menjadi disukai oleh keluarga Ayaka dan mulai mengunjungi rumahnya secara rutin.
Dari membuat makanan rumahan yang menyenangkan Ayaka, hingga pergi berbelanja kebutuhan sehari-hari bersama seperti pasangan pengantin baru, dan bahkan pergi menonton film malu-malu seperti sepasang kekasih muda, mereka mulai semakin dekat dengan menghabiskan momen-momen spesial ini di luar sekolah. Komedi romantis yang menawan dan canggung ini menampilkan gadis paling polos dan cantik di sekolah dan seorang pria yang diam-diam berkelas tinggi!
description.ja: 幼い頃に両親を亡くし、現在は祖母とふたりで暮らしている高校２年生・大槻晴翔は、自身の家事スキルを活かして夏休みに「家事代行サービス」の短期バイトを始める。しかしバイト初日に訪れた派遣先（豪邸）は偶然にも、学園一の美少女と名高い東條綾香の家だった。家事代行をする側とされる側、学校ではまったく交流のなかった二人が、不思議な関係で急接近ーー？
description.pt-br: Meu trabalho de meio período é na casa da garota mais fofa da escola. Uma comédia romântica tímida e estranha com a ídola da escola! Durante seu segundo ano do ensino médio, Haruto Otsuki começa um emprego de meio período como faxineiro durante as férias de verão. Seu primeiro cliente é ninguém menos que Ayaka Tojo, a garota mais linda da escola! Apesar de estar perplexo com esta reviravolta inesperada, Haruto continua fazendo suas tarefas domésticas. Com o tempo, ele se torna querido pela família de Ayaka e começa a visitar regularmente a casa dela. Desde preparar refeições caseiras que encantam Ayaka, até fazer compras juntos como um casal recém-casado, e até ir ao cinema tímidos como jovens amantes, eles começam a se aproximar passando esses momentos especiais fora da escola. Esta comédia romântica charmosa e desajeitada sobre tarefas domésticas, apresentando a garota mais inocente e bonita da escola e um cara secretamente de alta especificação, começa!

description.en: A slice-of-life story about two siblings, both jobless shut-ins. Haruko is a teenage girl who shares with her brother a love of laying around the house in sweats, watching television and playing video games. Her brother has a few friends, but Haruko has a lot of problems with social anxiety. The two of them pass their days happily playing together, though their mother worries about how she's going to get Haruko to shape up enough to find a husband.
description.pt: Haruko é uma adolescente que compartilha com seu irmão um amor de ficar em casa de moletom, assistindo televisão e jogando videogames. Seu irmão tem alguns amigos, mas Haruko tem um monte de problemas com ansiedade social. Os dois passam seus dias felizes brincando juntos, embora sua mãe se preocupa sobre como Haruko vai ficar e se melhorar o suficiente para encontrar um marido.
description.es-la: La historia del día a día de dos hermanos, ambos encerrados y sin trabajo. Haruko es una adolescente que comparte con su hermano el amor por holgazanear en la casa en sudaderas, mirar televisión y jugar videojuegos. Su hermano tiene algunos amigos, pero Haruko tiene muchos problemas de ansiedad social. Los dos pasan sus días felices jugando juntos, aunque a su madre le preocupa cómo hará que Haruko se ponga en forma lo suficiente como para encontrar un marido.

title.en: The Reincarnated Assassin Is a Swordmaster

altTitles.es-la: El asesino reencarnado es un genio de la espada

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Assassin is a Genius Swordsman

description.en:
Raon was once a loyal assassin for House Robert until Derus killed him. Not willing to give up, Raon prayed for vengeance and woke as a member of House Sieghart, the most powerful noble house!

He’ll need all of their near-infinite resources to get revenge. Though he carried over knowledge of a powerful Flame Link technique, he also carries the Curse of Bitter Frost, something that’s slowly killing him.

As if that weren’t enough, the demonic embodiment of Wrath is trying to take over his body!?
description.zh:
拉昂的一生就像一条拴着锁链的狗。
然而，造化弄人，他获得了新生
--即使他的怒火依然留在断裂的锁链之中。
终于能够自立，他决定按照自己的意愿生活。
“我会杀死一切阻挡我的人，神也不例外。”

altTitles.ja: 支配少女くばるちゃん

description.en:
After fierce bullying, Yuuto Kiba wanted to die. On the verge of committing suicide, his fate changes rapidly when a strange and funky beautiful girl, Kubaru, tells him, “Give me your life”.

Make your life happy with love?! A slightly strange and psycho love drama.
description.ja:
熾烈ないじめの末に、もう死にたいと思っていた少年・木場優人（きばゆうと）。自殺する寸前に、奇妙なファンキー美少女・くばるに「君の人生を頂戴」と言われたことで、運命が目まぐるしく変わっていく。

ラブで君の人生を幸せにする？！ちょっと奇妙でサイコなラブドラマ。

title.en: Class President's and Masochism Girl's Yuri

description.fr: Tomber amoureux devrait être une expérience excitante... mais pas pour Hari ! Notre héroïne est maudite par l'amour non réciproque, et Yura compte bien en profiter. Hari réussira-t-elle à avouer ses sentiments à son premier amour, ou se laissera-t-elle emporter par les complications de cet amour non partagé ? Son histoire d'amour passionnante est sur le point de commencer.
description.ko:
사랑에 빠지면 짜릿하다는데… 그래도 이건 아니잖아! 
짝사랑으로 인해 저주에 걸려버린 하리와 그 저주를 빌려달라는 유라.
하리는 과연 짝남 정원에게 고백할 것인가? 아니면 짝사랑을 포기할 것인가?
짜릿짜릿 하리의 첫사랑 전기 시작!

description.ja:
女の子は好きな物を食べたい！好きな服を着たい！好きな人と恋がしたい！

「外見の偏見は強いけど人生楽しんだもん勝ちだと勇気をもらいました！
　型にハマるより自由に生きるって大事ですね！ハッピーロリディ！」――青木美沙子(日本ロリータ協会会長)
「ロリータ服で大盛りごはん、たまらないです。こんなキャンパスライフ送りたかった！」――上坂すみれ(声優)

大学でロリータデビューをしたなつ子は悩みます。
「カツ丼もラーメンも食べたい！ …とはいえロリータのイメージを崩すわけにはいかない！」
でも食欲には抗えない！
そんな衣・食で悩む乙女の前に恋の悩みまで追加されて…。

description.en:
The bubbly and innocent little idol, Xiao Fengyu, encountered the calm and collected award-winning actress, He Yunhan. Soon after, they met once again as trainee and mentor in a reality show. This seemed like a great opportunity to get close to the goddess, but why could she constantly feel potential rivalry no matter where she went?

ShaDiaoDan arranged the little star XiaoFengYu to accidently meet HeYunHan, an ascetic actress, and the two are in a variety show as an instructor and trainee, It seems like a good opportunity to get intimate with goddess, but how can it seem to be full of crisis everywhere?
description.zh: 沙雕单线条小明星萧风瑜意外结识禁欲影后何芸涵，紧接着二人是一档综艺节目的导师与学员关系。看似是个亲近女神的好机会，可怎么好似处处充满危机呢？
description.es-la:
Xiao Fengyu, la jovial idol, se cruzó con He Yunhan, una actriz galardonada y serena. Cuando se reencontraron en un reality show como mentora y aprendiz, parecía el momento perfecto para acercarse. Sin embargo, ¿por qué sentía una rivalidad constante?

ShaDiaoDan orquestó un encuentro entre Xiao Fengyu y He Yunhan, y juntas participaron en un programa de variedades. Aparentemente, era una oportunidad ideal para conocer a su ídola, pero ¿por qué parecía que la tensión y el conflicto la rodeaban por todas partes?

title.en: My Childhood Friends Are Trying to Kill Me

altTitles.pt-br: Meus Amigos de Infância Estão Tentando me Matar

description.en: I not only reincarnated into someone who died in an absurd fashion, but I also took the crown prince's place and went to the secret neutral territory, where male members of the five imperial families gathered. As a result… my childhood friends know me as a boy.    “Goodbye, guys." I cried in front of my friends who I would never meet again. That was because officially, I (the prince) was going to die soon!    It was fun spending time with them, but I will never see them again. I hope everyone lives happily!    ***    After many years, my childhood friends turned heroes who defeated the wild dragon visited me.    "…Was it you? The one who killed my friend?"    “After killing the previous crown prince, the murderer is said to be living comfortably as a princess, right?”    “I will torture you, so much so you'll wish for death."     "Answer me. Why did you kill him?”    Of course, they didn't recognize me at all. No, that's not the problem… the problem is that my childhood friends are trying to kill me. Wait a second, guys!

altTitles.en: They are Still Being Shaken This Morning

description.en: This is your typical story of a boy who's secretly in love with a girl, they both share a 20 minute ride on the commuter train on their way to different schools, will the boy be able to approach the girl and confess his love? And also... What he doesn't know: There's 3 other passengers that secretly support the boy's secret love towards the girl! Read now the hijinks that ensue when the boy tries to approach the girl; from the creator of *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* and *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.
description.ja: 午前6時58分舞原行きの通学電車。名前も知らないあの子と僕…とその乗客!? 高校生の男女2人が醸し出す甘酸っぱい雰囲気に、乗客たちが心情駄々洩れで盛り上がる!!
description.pt-br: Esta é a típica história de um garoto que está secretamente apaixonado por uma garota. Ambos compartilham uma viagem de 20 minutos no trem do subúrbio a caminho de escolas diferentes. O garoto será capaz de se aproximar da garota e confessar seu amor? E, além disso... O que ele não sabe: há três outros passageiros que secretamente apoiam o amor secreto do garoto pela garota! Leia agora as confusões que acontecem quando o garoto tenta se aproximar da garota; do criador de *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* e *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.

altTitles.ja: できそこないの姫君たち

description.en: Fujishiro Nanaki is super cute, super popular, and super annoyed with anyone as plain as her classmate Kurokawa Kanade. When Nanaki finds out her boyfriend’s cheating on her, however, her life makes a complete 180—as does her relationship with Kanade. This all-new yuri manga series explores the budding romance between the cool girl in school and the “plain” girl she once brushed off!
description.pt-br: Nanaki-chan é a popular da escola, ela exalta sua beleza com a maior auto-estima e arrogância possível, ela é a princesinha fútil e imatura que acha que a aparência é fundamental. Mas um dia tudo isso vai por terra quando ela leva um pé na bunda gostosim do cara mais bonito e popular da escola. E pra piorar além de ser esculachada pelo zé bundão, tudo isso aconteceu na frente da mina que ela até então tirava uma onda por não ser tão vaidosa como ela… Só que dessa "tragédia" ela vai perceber que beleza nem sempre é tudo…
